block.p: You captured the spirit of a complex community of young people, their families, teachers, science mentors and heads of laboratories. I am the director of Rockefeller University's precollege science education programs, and each year my coordinator, Joseph Alonzo, and I place over 50 of the more than 200 students who apply. (Applications can be downloaded from our Web site at www.rockefeller. edu/ outreach. However, we are presently filled and cannot accept applications for summer 2000.)
